name: Resume PDF Converter
description: Automatically converts resume.md to PDF when the file is saved

actions.prompt:
I need to convert the resume.md file to a professional PDF format. Please:

1. Run the command `npm run resume:build` to execute the PDF conversion script
2. Verify that the PDF was created successfully in public/resume.pdf
3. If there are any errors, troubleshoot and fix them
4. Confirm the PDF looks professional and properly formatted

The conversion script uses Puppeteer to generate a clean, professional PDF suitable for a software engineer's resume.
